Texts.Eng:
Nox has explained how the Protector opened some sort of wormhole to the pocket dimension where the core of the entity resided, where she pursued them. Our most cognizant Lady was wise enough to take some samples of the smaller lifeforms that dwelled on the surface of the entity's planetoid form during her visit.

Nox believes that the remaining organic samples left over from the entity's destruction might give the Occasus some insight into its powers, and how they may be harnessed.
